messages: eb6fb87eed3b199ab430bd92dcd14b89 (06:12): can I write on an image in a td?

eb6fb87eed3b199ab430bd92dcd14b89 (06:13): the image is in a td cell and I just want to be able to write text over the pic
1c7f00e4057d97c61c62ee266d1fa423 (06:13): just make it a background for the cell
1c7f00e4057d97c61c62ee266d1fa423 (06:14): <td style="background:url(../images/fag.jpg) no-repeat; width:100px; height:50px; line-height:50px; color:#fff; text-align:center; }

eb6fb87eed3b199ab430bd92dcd14b89 (06:19): would this work?
eb6fb87eed3b199ab430bd92dcd14b89 (06:19): <tr style="background-image : inherit;">
eb6fb87eed3b199ab430bd92dcd14b89 (06:19): <td><img alt=" " src="perlotine-1-0.png" width="100" height="188"></td>
eb6fb87eed3b199ab430bd92dcd14b89 (06:19): all the other td#s would be part of the tr right so they would all become a backgroud?

d383d1688a6c4ff0b7b5ae7c1207c1b7 (06:26): the menu a's to be as tall as the div
d383d1688a6c4ff0b7b5ae7c1207c1b7 (06:26): i want them to rest inside that middle div
eb6fb87eed3b199ab430bd92dcd14b89 (06:26): now I have to make the image background then I have write in the image tag any text?
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (06:27): eul-: #menucontainer ul li a { padding: 0 !important; line-height: 1.5em; }

d383d1688a6c4ff0b7b5ae7c1207c1b7 (06:27): ahhh line height!!

d383d1688a6c4ff0b7b5ae7c1207c1b7 (06:29): #menucontainer ul li a { padding: 0 !important; -- that _alone_ fixed it
d383d1688a6c4ff0b7b5ae7c1207c1b7 (06:29): no need to alter line height :)
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (06:30): whatever floats yer boat

9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (07:14): between </li> and <li>
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (07:15): not <li> and </li>

d383d1688a6c4ff0b7b5ae7c1207c1b7 (07:16): you mean the actual space on the rendered page?
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (07:16): <li><a href="#">Milk</a><li>\n<li>
9621eb291fb98ba098685ed872b8cf9a (07:16): the newline
